page.title: 04MAULDEN HOUSING
page.content: Maulden is a conservation area, although much of it is taken up by houses which have been approved by the planning authority over the years. We spoke to a local builder who is building detached houses in Maulden,he said; {"Maulden started off as a small {village a lot of houses have been {allowed to be built." We looked at the houses and decided that there will not many more built. The most populuar type of house in Maulden is detached. There is an old peoples accommodation estate,which is looked after by a warden.
